pr_title: Issues/5688: copy all modified waypoints to notes

timeline.bodyText: Can your remove this comment, if the constant is no longer needed?
timeline.author: moving-bits

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/main/src/cgeo/geocaching/CacheDetailActivity.java b/main/src/cgeo/geocaching/CacheDetailActivity.java
index 734964a39..07fe65aa2 100644
--- a/main/src/cgeo/geocaching/CacheDetailActivity.java
+++ b/main/src/cgeo/geocaching/CacheDetailActivity.java

@@ -184,8 +185,6 @@ public class CacheDetailActivity extends AbstractViewPagerActivity<CacheDetailAc
 
     private static final String EXTRA_FORCE_WAYPOINTSPAGE = "cgeo.geocaching.extra.cachedetail.forceWaypointsPage";
 
-    //private static final int MAX_USERNOTE_SIZE = 2400; //max. allowed size on Geocaching.com
-
     /**
      * Minimal contrast ratio. If description:background contrast ratio is less than this value
      * for some string, foreground color will be removed and gray background will be used
